name: RipIt DVD Package
summary: Learn about .DVDMEDIA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: RipIt cannot burn new DVDs with DVDMEDIA files. However, it can export ripped DVDs to the standard DVD format (VIDEO_TS and AUDIO_TS directories) for burning with other DVD burning utilities.

To export ripped DVDs to the standard DVD format, either 1) uncheck the preferences option "use .dvdmedia extension" in RipIt before ripping a DVD, or 2) right click the DVDMEDIA file and select Show Package Contents.

description: Ripped DVD package created by RipIt, a program used to make digital backups of DVDs; contains audio and video files ripped from a DVD; used for backing up DVDs and playing them with Apple DVD Player.
